description:
'English Professional Emails' is an e-learning course created specifically for work purposes.

Real life examples and excellent learning materials will help you to learn faster and more effectively. The course provides standardisation rules for writing excellent business emails.

The course will help you to:

  • significantly improve the quality of your emails if English is not your first language,
  • have a better contextual awareness (using the right words and expressions targeted to your audience),
  • communicate efficiently, effectively, and use expressions correctly.

By learning with us you will be more confident, and look even more professional in a working environment.
title: English Professional Emails
